title: Russian court shuts down human rights group Memorial International
content:
1. Russian court shuts down human rights group Memorial International  CNN
  2. Russian Court Orders Liquidation of the Human Rights Group Memorial  The New York Times
  3. Russia orders top rights group shut, capping year of crackdowns  Reuters
  4. Russia orders shutdown of human rights group for creating 'false image' of USSR  Fox News
  5. Russia's International Memorial Society liquidated after Supreme Court ruling  The Washington Post

localize.title: ロシアの裁判所が人権団体「メモリアル・インターナショナル」を閉鎖
俄罗斯法院关闭了人权组织 "纪念国际"。
俄羅斯法院關閉了人權組織 "紀念國際"。
